name: Assault
description: Can be shot even if the bearer's unit Advanced.

name: Blast
description: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic for every five models in the target unit (rounding down). Can never be used against a target that is within Engagement Range of any friendly units.

name: Devastating Wounds
description: Saving throws cannot be made against Critical Wounds scored by this weapon (including invulnerable saving throws). Such attacks inflict mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic instead of normal damage.

name: Heavy
description: Add 1 to Hit rolls if the bearer's unit Remained Stationary this turn.

name: Ignores Cover
description: Each time an attack is made with such a weapon, the target cannot have the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

name: Indirect Fire
description: Can target and make attacks against units that are not visible to the attacking unit. If no models are visible, subtract 1 from Hit rolls and the target has the Benefit of Cover.

name: Lethal Hits
description: Each time an attack is made with such a weapon, a Critical Hit automatically wounds the target.

name: Pistol
description: Can be shot even if the bearer's unit is within Engagement Range of enemy units, but must target one of those enemy units. Cannot be shot alongside non-Pistol weapons.

name: Rapid Fire
description: Increase the Attacks characteristic by the specified amount when targeting units within half range.

name: Sustained Hits
description: Each Critical Hit scores the specified number of additional hits on the target.

name: Torrent
description: Each time an attack is made with such a weapon, that attack automatically hits the target.

name: Twin-linked
description: Each time an attack is made with such a weapon, you can re-roll that attack's Wound roll.

name: Precision
description: When targeting an Attached unit, the attacking model can allocate hits to a Character model in that unit if it is visible to the attacker.

name: Anti
description: An unmodified Wound roll of the specified value or higher against a target with the matching keyword scores a Critical Wound.

name: Hazardous
description: After a unit shoots or fights, roll one D6 for each Hazardous weapon used. For each 1, one model equipped with a Hazardous weapon is destroyed (or suffers 3 mortal wounds if a Character, Monster, or Vehicle).

name: Melta
description: Each time an attack is made with such a weapon against a target within half range, increase the Damage characteristic by the specified amount.

name: Lance
description: Each time an attack is made with such a weapon, if the bearer made a Charge move this turn, add 1 to that attack's Wound roll.

name: One Shot
description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

name: Extra Attacks
description: The bearer can attack with this weapon in addition to any other weapons it can make attacks with.

name: Psychic
description: This is a Psychic weapon. If a unit is targeted by one or more Psychic weapons, after resolving those attacks it must take a Battle-shock test.
